readable.title: 2718024196_3ff660416a
readable.content: A boy in a blue bathing suit jumps with his arms in the air in a backyard setting . A little boy is jumping into the kiddie pool in the backyard . A little boy is leaping in the air onto a water slide . A young boy plays outside on a sunny day on his slip and slide . The boy in the swimming trunks is playing in the yard .
